author: Simple History
description:
Ever wondered what it really feels like to command an entire armored force? Try World of Tanks for free with our link and use code COMBAT for a strong head start: https://tanks.ly/3WlaX1N

Discover the Renault FT — the little tank that changed everything. Born in the trenches of WWI, it introduced the rotating turret and rear engine layout that became the blueprint for every modern tank. In this video, we explore its design, battlefield role, and lasting legacy in military history.

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
Discord server: https://discord.gg/JZsPQXHeYC
Become a Simple History member: https://www.youtube.com/simplehistory/join

title: Life Inside The Most Advanced Tank Of WWI (Cross Section)
